name: Keno Tap
description:
The #1 Keno App on the app store, Keno Tap. Tap between 2 and 10 numbers, then anxiously watch as 20 random numbers, or balls, are chosen to see how many matches you get. The more you bet, the more you can win!

Features:
• Retro Casino Feel
• Win Meter
• Quick Pick (Random Numbers)
• Saves Credits between sessions
• 5 Speeds (Slow, Normal, Fast, Really Fast, and Instant)
• Bet up to 1 Trillion credits per game (if you can afford to)
• Auto-Play (Press and hold the go button after picking numbers)
• … OH, AND IT'S FREE!

In App Purchases
• Buy 5 Million Credits
• Buy 1 Million Credits
• Buy 100K Credits

Keno Tap provides hours of fun. If you like other casino games like poker, texas hold 'em, slot machines, roulette, or black jack, then you'll want to add this exciting classic Keno game to your collection!

We give you 100 Credits every time you run out. Can you get up to 1,000? Ten thousand? One Million? We challenge you to do so. Send us a screen shot if you get up to one million!

Your 5 Star ratings help continue development!
